quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Movie Blood Diamond
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, country. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Kagiso Kuypers portrays Hounsous son in the movie Blood Diamond. What does he become?

options.text: A very good medic for the S.L.R.F.
A very good slave for the S.L.R.F.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A very good soldier

questions.question: What character did Peter Fonda play in the 2007 film Ghost rider?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mephistopheles

questions.question: What happens to Danny Archer at the end of the movie Blood Diamond?

options.text: He is flown to safety in a plane with Maddy Bowen.
He sells the large blood diamond and shares the money with the village.
He donates the proceeds of the diamond sale to the UN Commission dealing with conflict diamonds.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He dies.

questions.question: Nicholas Cage co-wrote parts of the script of the 2007 film Ghost Rider.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What actor played young Johnny Blaze in the 2007 film Ghost Rider?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Matt Long

questions.question: What is the rating of the 2007 film Ghost Rider according to The Motion Picture Association of Americas standards?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: PG-13

questions.question: Who directed the movie Blood Diamond?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Edward Zwick

questions.question: What is the length of the 2007 movie Ghost Rider?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 114 minutes

questions.question: Who plays American journalist Maddy Bowen, the main female character in the movie Blood Diamond?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jennifer Connelly

questions.question: Which countrys diamonds were the first ones banned as conflict (or blood) diamonds by the UN?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Angolas

questions.question: Actor Nicholas Cage, who plays the role of Ghost Rider in the 2007 movie of the same name, has a Ghost Rider tattoo in real life.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In which country was the 2007 film Ghost Rider mostly filmed?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Australia

questions.question: The movie Blood Diamond, set in the civil war in Sierra Leone, was made by Warner Bros. Pictures. What promise did the company not keep?

options.text: To donate money to the UN  commission dealing with blood diamonds
To provide prosthetics to the children of Sierra Leone.
To film the movie in Sierra Leone
To match all charitable contributions made by the movies cast and crew

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To provide prosthetics to the children of Sierra Leone.

questions.question: The mercenary group, featured in the movie Blood Diamond, was loosely based on Executive Outcomes, a real mercenary group that once operated in Africa. In which country was Executive Outcomes based?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: South Africa

questions.question: What Spin City star appeared in Rick Rosenthals movie Bad Boys?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alan Ruck
